text: Ongoing journey continues with our passport barista.   Around the place, too many construction that ruins the surrounding. The café is huge, chairs/tables/ couches/ bar stools are all around but very somber. Outside, there is lovely terrace setup.  We arrived around 6pm; so at this time there is not much of snacks left. I got a chocolate cold coffee and espresso biscotti. My server was pretty cute person. She was super friendly. I am a fashionista. I simply loved her style.   We decides to sit outside and take the advantage of the beautiful weather. When my order arrived, I didn't expect my biscotti to come in beautiful presentation. It was on a square platter, decorated with fresh fruits. It made my biscotti super delicious. My chocolate cold coffee was delicious. It wasn't super sweet; a perfect balance of taste.   It's worth it to visit this nice spot.

Un petit café-bistro bien confortable juste ne face du parc Molson. J'y suis venue histoire de tuer le temps lors d'une série de rendez-vous familiaux chez notre dentiste qui a son bureau juste en face. Un petit chai latte et un parfait au granola dans une ambiance agréable, quoi demander de mieux le matin?

A nice somber cafe/bar giving you the option to sit inside or outside on the terrasse. The weather was beautiful so we chose to sit outside.   Our server was one of the kindest people I've come across and very professional. My friends and I ordered iced coffees, which she brought out to us. It was significantly large glass. I had ordered the chocolate flavoured iced coffee but I didn't like it at all. The cacao powder tasted weird over the frothed  coffee but my friend loved it so I switched with her drink (a regular iced coffee). I really enjoyed the regular iced coffee. There wasn't many options to eat so we had a biscotti which was pretty tasty.   Overall a nice, chic, modern cafe but nothing spectacular.   P.s. They should really pay attention to cleaning up their bathroom properly.

Endroit "légendaire" près du parc Molson, cette buanderie-bistro continue d'attirer une faune bigarrée d'habitués et de résidents du quartier. On vient parce qu'il n'y a absolument rien de prétentieux ici. Cet endroit ne suit pas les modes et c'est très bien ainsi. Le café a fait leur réputation, mais on vient aussi pour prendre une bière l'été sur la terrasse sur Beaubien avec une vue sur le parc. On donne aussi rendez-vous à quelqu'un, on y prend un petit lunch sur le pouce, avec une belle conversation parmi les habitués. Ah oui, il y a aussi une buanderie célèbre à l'arrière...
